{{title|operator&lt;&lt;{{small|(std::filesystem::directory_entry)}}}}
{{cpp/filesystem/directory_entry/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++17|1=
template&lt; class CharT, class Traits &gt;
friend std::basic_ostream&lt;CharT,Traits&gt;&amp;
    operator&lt;&lt;( std::basic_ostream&lt;CharT,Traits&gt;&amp; os, const directory_entry&amp; d );
}}
{{dcl end}}

Performs stream output on the directory entry {{c|d}}. Equivalent to {{c|return os &lt;&lt; d.path();}}.

{{cpp/hidden friend|std::filesystem::directory_entry|tmpl=yes}} This prevents undesirable conversions in the presence of a {{c|using namespace std::filesystem;}} [[cpp/language/namespace#Using-directives|using-directive]].

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|os|stream to perform output on}}
{{par|d|{{tt|directory_entry}} to be inserted}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
{{c|os}}

{{cpp/impldef exception}}

===Example===
{{example
|code=
#include &lt;filesystem&gt;
#include &lt;iostream&gt;
namespace fs = std::filesystem;

int main()
{
    const auto entries = {fs::directory_entry{fs::current_path()},
                          fs::directory_entry{fs::temp_directory_path()}&lt;!----&gt;};

    for (const fs::directory_entry&amp; de : entries)
        std::cout &lt;&lt; de &lt;&lt; '\n';
}
|p=true
|output=
"/home/çŒ«"
"/tmp"
}}
